amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt small businesses from the post-grant reviews and reexaminations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 112-111 to eliminate the burden of post-grant reviews and reexaminations on individual inventors and small businesses with 100 or fewer employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 342 (Roll no. 488).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 342 (Roll no. 488).
